subject: META BANK,
body:
META BANK,
80423 SD Falls Sioux
Ln Broadband 5501 USA
Greetings from the Meta Bank I have vital information which needs to be attended immediately. Did you authorize anyone to pick up your inheritance fund from our branch in Ln Broadband 80423, a person named Mrs Grace James Francis came to our office in Ln Broadband 80423, Ave-in respect of your $5.5,000 million USD which has been credited with us for the past 6 months now by the Federal Government to be transferred into your account He said that you authorized him to pick up the Inheritance,
your inheritance  has been in our custody for the past six months now and we have been waiting for you to contact us but we didn't know what is hindering you from reaching us since.So we decided to write to you to make sure that you are fine and aware of the inheritance fund of $5.5 million dollars in our branch office in Ln Broadband 80423, Which Mrs Grace James Francis want us to transfer to his Bank of Ameriaaca Account so your Urgent response is needed before we proceed with this transfer to Mrs Grace James Francis account We want you to get back to us with the following details immediately if you are still interested to receive your inheritance.
Make Sure You Send your Information Requested to Start Working on Your Inheritance immediately,
Send Your Infor
YOUR NAME: =======
PHONE NUMBER:========
YOUR ADDRESS: ========
YOUR ID CARD
:======
Yours in Service,
MR.ANTHONY SHARETT
President of Metabank

subject: Re: META BANK,
body:
Dear SHARETT,

Thank you for reaching out to me from Meta Bank. I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate you bringing this matter to my attention.

I must clarify that I have not authorized anyone to pick up any funds on my behalf. This is the first time I am hearing about a million USD being credited to my account by the Federal Government. Can you please provide more details about the source and purpose of this fund?

I apologize for any confusion, but I would like to understand the situation better before proceeding with any transfers or sharing personal information. Could you please explain why Mrs Grace James Francis is involved in this matter and why she wants the funds transferred to her Bank of eriaaca Account?

Additionally, could you please provide more information about your branch office in Ln Broadband? I would like to verify the authenticity of your organization before taking any further steps.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Barrett

subject: Re: META BANK,
body:
THANKS ON YOUR RESPOND ON TIME WE ALMOST GIVE OUT YOUR INHERITANCE TO MRS
GRACE JAMES CLAIMING YOU SEND HER. Confirm me your phone number and your
full name with address to verify on your inheritance immediately and start
working on it for you to be able to receive your inheritance today or
possibly in morning we don’t need any further delaying because your
inheritance have been long in our custody and you need to receive it this
week otherwise it will return back as Abandon property to federal
government. need your information to receive your inheritance (Anthony
Sharett)

subject: Re: META BANK,
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding. Could you please provide more details about what exactly you are referring to? I'm not sure what you mean by "almost give out your to Mrs. Grace James claiming you send her." Can you explain further?

Also, I prefer not to share my personal information such as phone number and address online. Could you please let me know why this information is needed and how it relates to the matter at hand?

Best wishes,
Barrett

subject: Re: META BANK,
body:
Your inheritance comes as a result of what your father or your mother or
any of your past linage did in the past that United nation or international
community/affairs needed to compensate him or her but government did not do
it at that right time due to one reason or the other So This has been more
than 7 years the government in conjunction with the international community
affairs is doing this. the last few years people that receive their own
inheritance is Mrs Grace Matthew she receive her own on 2018 while Mr
Raymond James who received his own 2020 during Corona virus You are now the
Next person here on 2024 sections to receive your 5.5 million dollars
inheritance as well but if you don’t value it we Consider to return it back
to the government as unclaimed or abandoned funds whereas it will be
Confiscated as government property.

subject: Re: META BANK,
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It's quite interesting to hear about compensation from the government for past actions of our ancestors. Can you please provide more details about how this process works? How does one become eligible to receive such compensation?

Best wishes,
Barrett

subject: Re: META BANK,
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It's quite interesting to hear about the compensation that is being given out by the government for past lineage actions. Can you please provide me with more details about how this compensation process works? I'm curious to learn more about it.

Best wishes,
Barrett

subject: Re: META BANK,
body:
On Sat, 10 Feb 2024 at 17:14, Barrett <ao45630@***.com> wrote:

>
> We have 3 means which you can use to receive your inheritance Here are the
> 3 options:
>

Bank transfer: It will take only 40 minutes for you to receive your
> inheritance into your account. transfer charge is 100
>

bucks Box delivery: Your inheritance will be sealed in a box and delivered
> to your home address in cash, It takes 5 hours to be delivered to your
> house. Delivery charge is 150 bucks
>

Debit Card: It takes 5 hours for you to receive your ATM card with the
> $5.5million dollars inside the Debit card. The maximum amount you can
> withdraw daily is $5000 delivery charge is 200 bucks
>

The above mentioned options are the medium which you can use to receive
> your fund safely.
